author: Sefy Levy
description: Assess slag chemistry, furnace efficiency, and desulfurization potential

classifications.name: ACIDIC SLAG (Bq < 0.5)
classifications.description: Highly acidic, glassy slag - poor desulfurization
classifications.notes: Low-temperature, glassy slag - inefficient sulfur removal

classifications.name: BASIC SLAG (Bq 1.2-2.0)
classifications.notes: Efficient sulfur removal - typical of advanced metallurgy

classifications.name: HIGHLY BASIC (Bq > 2.0)
classifications.description: Very basic slag - excellent desulfurization but high melting point
classifications.notes: Excellent desulfurization but requires high furnace temperatures
